projectGridLines.title: Inwise.ai helps sales teams
projectGridLines.description:
Intern Responsibilities:

  • Research and evaluate existing search and information retrieval methodologies.
  • Design and prototype new features for improved information searchability and filtering.
  • Conduct user testing and gather feedback on the proposed solutions.
  • Develop and implement front-end user interface (UI) elements for the new features (if applicable).
  • (Optional) Explore integration with natural language processing (NLP) capabilities for more advanced search functionalities.
  • Document the project process, findings, and recommendations.

Desired Skills:

  • Strong understanding of user interface (UI) design principles.
  • Proficiency in front-end development languages (e.g., HTML, CSS, Javascript) (if applicable).
  • Familiarity with search algorithms and information retrieval principles.
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
  • Strong communication and written documentation skills.
  • Passion for building user-friendly and efficient software solutions.

Project Deliverables:

  • A comprehensive research report on existing information retrieval solutions.
  • Prototypes of the proposed features for user testing.
  • User testing reports with documented feedback and insights.
  • Developed and implemented UI elements for new features (if applicable).
  • Project documentation including code (if applicable), design decisions, and recommendations.
